name: @skr-cloudify/repomix-cloud
description: Package remote and local repositories into a compact bundle for rapid code comprehension and review. Work with private repos and reopen previously generated outputs with ease. Browse directories and read files directly from your workspace.

tools.name: pack_remote_repository
tools.description: Package remote git repository into a consolidated file for AI analysis

compress.description: Use Tree-sitter to extract essential code signatures while removing implementation details

githubToken.description: GitHub personal access token for private repository access (optional if configured in server settings)

ignorePatterns.description: Specify additional files to exclude using fast-glob compatible patterns

includePatterns.description: Specify which files to include using fast-glob compatible patterns

tools.name: pack_codebase
tools.description: Package local code directory into a consolidated file for AI analysis

compress.description: Utilize Tree-sitter to intelligently extract essential code signatures and structure while removing implementation details, significantly reducing token usage (default: true)

ignorePatterns.description: Specify additional files to exclude using fast-glob compatible patterns (e.g., "test/**,*.spec.js"). These patterns complement .gitignore and default ignores. It is recommended to pack only necessary files.

topFilesLength.description: Number of top files to display in the metrics (default: 10)

includePatterns.description: Specify which files to include using fast-glob compatible patterns (e.g., "**/*.js,src/**"). Only files matching these patterns will be processed. It is recommended to pack only necessary files.

tools.name: read_repomix_output
tools.description: Read the contents of a previously generated repomix output file

outputId.description: Output ID from a previous pack operation

tools.name: file_system_read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a specific file from the file system

path.description: Absolute path to the file to read

tools.name: file_system_read_directory
tools.description: List the contents of a directory

path.description: Absolute path to the directory to read
